sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FixScriptForMilestoneField</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FixScriptForMilestoneField</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FixScriptForMilestoneField = Class.create();
FixScriptForMilestoneField.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.projectTaskTable = 'pm_project_task';
    },

    fixProjectTask: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(this.projectTaskTable);
        gr.addQuery("duration", "1970-01-01 00:00:00");
        gr.setValue("milestone", "1");
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		// Will still run one at a time with auditing true for project task.
		gr.updateMultiple();
    },

    type: 'FixScriptForMilestoneField'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-11-25 08:53:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4a3d3ab77f3302009b5b91679ffa9162</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FixScriptForMilestoneField</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4a3d3ab77f3302009b5b91679ffa9162</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-07-05 03:08:37</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>531</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
